content.rendered:
LIBT-1N01 is a single board solution based on nRF52810 chipset with Bluetooth Low Energy V5.0 .
The LIBT-1N01 supports key Bluetooth 5 features of high throughput (2Mbps) and increased broadcast capacity withadvertising extensions (x8). The LIBT-1N01 supports two of the three flagship features of Bluetooth 5, high Throughput Mode and Advertising Extensions. High throughput doubles the on-air data rate to 2Mbs offering new use cases and up to a 50% saving in energy usage. Advertising Extensions offers significant increases in broadcasting capacity (x8) for broadcast applications, including beacons.

excerpt.rendered:
• On chip Trace Antenna
  • BLE Mesh Support
  • OTA Support
  • 6 Low Pan Support
  • Peer to Peer Support
  • Security
